attributes.action: Make it the law to report a cat being hit and left in the road
attributes.additional_details: At present it is not illegal to report a cat left in the road in a hit and run, as it is not included in the Road Traffic Act
attributes.background: At present it is not the law to report a hit and run on killing a cat on the road and leaving it, as it is not included in the road traffic act, let's get this changed!
